item.title: Chris Brown Ordered to Remain in Custody After Arrest in England
item.description: The singer was charged with grievous bodily harm over a 2023 incident in London. He was ordered to remain in custody until June 13.

item.title: Trump’s Visit Makes a Splash in Saudi Arabia
item.description: Many Saudis say they are big fans of President Trump, calling him a “straight shooter” who shares their values. Others were not impressed.

item.title: Studies of Breast Cancer and Other Diseases Threatened by New Policy
item.description: N.I.H. restrictions on payments to foreign partners may jeopardize research into conditions that would benefit Americans.

item.title: Trump Says ‘People Are Starving’ in Gaza and the U.S. Wants to Help
item.description: Humanitarian support has collapsed in the enclave, which has been under total Israeli blockade for more than two months. Aid groups warn that the terr...

item.title: Ukrainian Man, Roman Lavrynovych, Appears in Court Over Fires at Keir Starmer’s Properties
item.description: Roman Lavrynovych, 21, was charged with committing arson at two properties and a car with connections to Prime Minister Keir Starmer.
